alert.note: Alert for Benton; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 1:03AM CDT until May 05 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 103 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fayetteville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Huntsville... Farmington... Elkins... Tontitown... Greenland... Hindsville... Wesley... Forum... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Withrow Springs State Park... War Eagle... Drake Field Airport... Johnson... Elm Springs... Goshen... Alabam... Best... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 56 and 74. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
